basics.name: Xavier Guihot
basics.label: Scala Data Engineer
basics.summary:
I love working on complex algorithmic oriented and data related projects specially when the tech stack includes Scala, Mongo, Akka, Spark and d3.js.
I'm looking for new opportunities that’d combine my two passions: software engineering and the space industry.

work.summary:
Minna provides bank customers with subscription management solutions (subscription overview, easy cancellation, service provider switch, ...).
I'm in charge of the subscription detection engine (the algorithm that discovers subscriptions out of users' transactions). This mainly consists in:
highlights: Upgrading and rethinking the algorithm (resulting in an increase of the detection accuracy from 40% to 95%).
Creating the tools necessary to build an annotated/labelled dataset, to measure the accuracy, tune the algorithm, validate changes and visualise the data.

work.summary: Live streaming of sport data feeds for media and sport betting companies.
highlights: Low-latency and highly reliable sport data collection and broadcasting via Scala/Akka micro services.

work.summary:
By monitoring millions of search terms on a daily basis, Adthena helps digital marketers understand their paid and organic ranking in google search.
My role consists in leveraging the massive amount of collected data and serving it to the client facing web application:
highlights: Java endpoints on top of SQL Amazon Redshift instances

work.summary:
Amadeus is a global distribution system providing search, pricing, booking, ticketing and other processing services in real-time to travel providers and travel agencies.
Part of a data mining team in charge of flight search engine analytics:
highlights: Scala Spark pipelines over billions of records on a 30TB-RAM Hadoop cluster
Customer choice modelling in order to improve and adapt displayed flight recommendations, resulting in verified conversion improvements
Transitioning workflows and pipelines for Amadeus' new Hadoop production cluster

work.summary: Part of a team from the simulation department, my project consists in developing a desktop app allowing users to edit the representation of process workflows.
TCP simulations with NS2 (network simulator) of large-scale experimental measurements on different cellular networks using different technologies (3G, 4G, TCP variants, ...).

education.summary:
ISAE: Graduate Institute of Space and Aeronautical Engineering.
French equivalent of a Master's Degree in Engineering.

Two-year university degree in mathematics and physics (DEUG).
Ranked 2 out of 307 in physics and 5 out of 307 in mathematics at the CCP DEUG entrance exam for engineering schools.
